description: This file provides a web-based user interface for initial network setup on a router, including configuration of LAN IP address, subnet mask, DHCP range, DMZ host, and router name. It includes embedded PHP for server-side data integration, HTML for structure, CSS styles, and JavaScript (primarily jQuery) for client-side validation and interaction.

methods.name: setIPconfiguration
methods.description: Sends the network configuration data via AJAX to apply initial setup, handles reboot triggering, and validates current network settings before applying changes.
